CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "Digital Blueline"), "Digital Blueline,", NULL) + ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "Composed Color Proof"), "Composed Color Proof,", NULL) + ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "InSite"), "InSite,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "Loose Color"), "Loose Color,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "PDF"), "PDF,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "Press Check"), "Press Check,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "Other"), "Other,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "1 Set of Proofs"), "1 Set of Proofs,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "2 Sets of Proofs"), "2 Sets of Proofs,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "3 Sets of Proofs"), "3 Sets of Proofs,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "4 Sets of Proofs"), "4 Sets of Proofs,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "5 Sets of Proofs"), "5 Sets of Proofs,", NULL)+ ' ' + IF(INCLUDES( Proofs__c , "Ink Drawdown"), "Ink Drawdown", NULL)+ ' '
CustomField.label: Proofs formatting
